an1.71:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that gives rise to skillful qualities, or makes unskillful qualities decline like good friends.
an1.71:1.2: When you have good friends, skillful qualities arise and unskillful qualities decline.”
an1.72:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that gives rise to unskillful qualities, or makes skillful qualities decline like pursuing bad habits and not good habits.
an1.72:1.2: When you pursue bad habits and not good habits, unskillful qualities arise and skillful qualities decline.”
an1.73:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that gives rise to skillful qualities, or makes unskillful qualities decline like pursuing good habits and not bad habits.
an1.73:1.2: When you pursue good habits and not bad habits, skillful qualities arise and unskillful qualities decline.”
an1.74:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that prevents the awakening factors from arising, or, if they’ve already arisen, prevents them from being fully developed like improper attention.
an1.74:1.2: When you attend improperly, the awakening factors don’t arise, or, if they’ve already arisen, they’re not fully developed.”
an1.75:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that gives rise to the awakening factors, or, if they’ve already arisen, fully develops them like proper attention.
an1.75:1.2: When you attend properly, the awakening factors arise, or, if they’ve already arisen, they’re fully developed.”
